entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lynn Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
